bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition brought forth by the presence of phlegm. Dan xi zhi fa xin yao Book on clinical medicine. Ming era, 丹溪治法心要 1543. 2: 痰病久得澀脈，卒 難得開，必費調理 , “If a phlegm disease persists over an extended period of time, the [movement in the] vessels will be rough. This is difficult to resolve in a short time; one must make great efforts to restore health!”
